cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.name: cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c
cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.description: Stores the details of the contract payment object. With this object, you can track the types of customer payment requests that are agreed via a contract.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Accountable__c.description: User who's accountable for the contract payment.

cgcloud__Contract_Payment_Template__c.description: Reference to the contract payment template.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Specifies the currency of the order based on the sales org currency of the order template object. This attribute must have the same picklist values as the sales org currency field.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Initiation_Date__c.description: Date of the entry of the claim.

cgcloud__Paid_Amount__c.description: Stores the final paid requested amount.

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: Describes the current phase of the contract payment.

cgcloud__Reference_Date__c.description: Reference date of the contract payment.

cgcloud__Responsible__c.description: User who's responsible for the contract payment.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the contract payment belongs.

cgcloud__Submitted_for_Approval__c.description: Describes whether the contract is submitted for approval. The mobility system (Sync. Purposes) uses this attribute.

cgcloud__Text__c.description: Stores the text of a payment request.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Name of the workflow that's specified in the contract payment template.
